primary.context: Customer is unable to log in to their account due to an invalid account number error and a previous link failing.
primary.detail: The agent verified the customer and sent a payment link via email and text.

secondary.context: Customer reports account number is invalid and previous registration link failed.
secondary.detail: Agent pivoted from login troubleshooting to providing a direct payment link to satisfy the customer's ultimate goal.

steps: Customer identified themselves and reported login issues.
Agent performed account lookup and verification using phone, name, and state.
Customer explained that a previously sent registration link did not work.
Agent identified the primary goal was to make a payment.
Agent confirmed property and contact details.
Agent sent a payment link via email and text.

clarifications.note: Confirming spelling of name for verification

actions.detail: Verified name and state of residence
Sent link to email and text

insights.summary: Customer was frustrated by login errors and a failed previous link; the agent successfully verified them and sent a direct payment link to resolve their underlying need.
insights.verbatim: I'm trying to get into my account. The account number is wrong. ... You sent me it already and it did not work.
